attributes.action: legalise cannabis for the governments gain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
every day more and more people (including celebraties) are admitting to smoking some form of cannabis 

i propose that the government legalises cannabis and sells it themselves 

pros for government selling and legalising cannabis

1, all cannabis dealers will be out of buisiness which leaves time and resources for more serios crimes
2, government can place tax on it like cigarettes which gives more money to the econemy
3, can be available without consiquences to those who need it (medical)



but it should still be illegal for unlicensed people to sell it or grow it

this way the government wins and so do the thousands of people that smoke it


every year there are thousands of deaths related to drinking, smoking, driving and harder drugs. 
very little reports of deaths due to cannabis in comparison

i believe there are more than 1 million people out there who share the same views and i think this petition will prove it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
